title: REGR:Oscar app creation is failing with XDMP-VALIDATEUNEXPECTED error
description:
In appbuilder,click on new example app
fill out the name & db text fields
click create
error occurs

Non oscars app creation & deployment is fine. Issue occurs only with example app

changeHistory.comment:
before we report bugs, are we 100% certain all related unit tests passing ?

sounds like something has changed and someone's gone and broke something ;)
the reason why this is broken is due to a schema change

as expected was related to schema change e.g. Gajanan fixed

Jim,

Thanks for your patience. The "include-root" didn't work in this case because as per schema it was supposed to be wrapped in a "field-root" element on b7_0.

After some discussions with Mary and CJL today, I removed the "field-root" and "field-paths" elements from field schema in database.xsd. This is a delicate change since I replaced xs:all (order in-sensitive syntax) with xs:sequence (order-sensitive syntax). I have made bunch of changes to admin api, admin ui, c++ code and Config/databases.xml. Though I have done good amount of testing, I am expecting this change to show some failures in tonight's nightly regression. The best I can do is to chase these failures quickly and stabilize sand-box/nightly regression asap; I will exactly do that.

Again thank you for all your patience and please let me know the failures that you notice.

Rgds,

Gajanan
I know this is working now. Gaurav, please ship it after verifying it once on latest nightly.
